    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Manifold Edge](/Feats.aspx?ID=542) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 177 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[hunter's edge, masterful hunter](/Classes.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You've learned every possible edge to use against your foes. When you use [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10), you can gain a different hunter's edge benefit instead of the one you selected at 1st level. If you do, you don't gain the additional benefit from masterful hunter.
